titleStmt.title: Eikon aklastos The image vnbroaken : a perspective of the impudence, falshood, vanitie, and prophannes, published in a libell entitled Eikonoklastēe [sic] against Eikon basilikē, or, The pourtraicture of His Sacred Majestie in his solitudes and sufferings.
titleStmt.author: Jane, Joseph, fl. 1600-1660.

notesStmt.note: Has been attributed to John Earle, Bp. of Salisbury.--cf. Almack, A bibliography of The king's book, or, Eikon basilike, p. 74.
Possibly printed at Leyden by the Elzevirs.--cf. Caxton Head catalogue, 862. London, 1922. no. 455.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
